article_title: Novartis Gets FDA Approval For Skin Cancer Drug Combination
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: novartis, gets, fda, approval, skin, cancer, drug, combination

og.description: The FDA approved drug will treat metastatic melanoma, an aggressive form of skin cancer.
og.title: FDA Approves Skin Cancer Drug
